mapper.select: SELECT /* MLAJoinPtcDAO.selectJoinPtcList */ B.ACCNT_NO , NVL(C.PROD_PRT_NM , C.PROD_NM) AS PROD_NM , FN_MODEL_CL_NM(B.PROD_MODEL_KIND) AS PROD_MODEL , B.JOIN_DT , B.NEW_CHAN_GUNSU , C.PROD_CD , C.PROD_AMT , C.EXPR_NO , C.PAY_TYPE , (SELECT COUNT(SEQ) FROM PAY_MNG WHERE DEL_FG = 'N' AND ACCNT_NO = B.ACCNT_NO) AS TRUE_CNT , (SELECT NVL(SUM(PAY_AMT), 0) FROM PAY_MNG WHERE DEL_FG = 'N' AND ACCNT_NO = B.ACCNT_NO) AS TRUE_AMT , (SELECT NVL(SUM(PAY_AMT), 0) FROM PAY_MNG_DTL WHERE DEL_FG = 'N' AND ACCNT_NO = B.ACCNT_NO) AS RELAT_AMT , (SELECT NVL(SUM(PAY_AMT), 0) FROM PAY_MNG_DTL1 WHERE DEL_FG = 'N' AND ACCNT_NO = B.ACCNT_NO) AS ADD_AMT , (SELECT MAX(RESN_CL) KEEP(DENSE_RANK LAST ORDER BY SEQ) FROM RESCISSION WHERE DEL_FG = 'N' AND ACCNT_NO = B.ACCNT_NO) AS RESN_CL , (SELECT MAX(RESN_PROC_YN) KEEP(DENSE_RANK LAST ORDER BY SEQ) FROM RESCISSION WHERE DEL_FG = 'N' AND ACCNT_NO = B.ACCNT_NO) AS RESN_PROC_YN , DECODE(FN_ACCNT_STAT(B.ACCNT_NO), 'Y', '정상', 'R', '해약', 'E', '행사', '청약철회') AS ACC_STAT , FN_YEN_CHE(B.ACCNT_NO) AS PAY_STAT , FN_EVENT_DAY(ACCNT_NO) AS EVNT_DAY -- 행사 날짜 FROM MEMBER A, MEM_PROD_ACCNT B, PRODUCT C WHERE A.MEM_NO = B.MEM_NO AND B.PROD_CD = C.PROD_CD AND A.DEL_FG = 'N' AND B.DEL_FG = 'N' AND A.MEM_NO = #{memNo} AND EXISTS(SELECT 'X' FROM PAY_MNG WHERE DEL_FG = 'N' AND ACCNT_NO = B.ACCNT_NO) AND FN_ACCNT_STAT(B.ACCNT_NO) IN('Y', 'R', 'E') -- 청약 철회 제외 ORDER BY B.REG_DM DESC
